page.title: 18Ghost Stories
page.content: Where I live on the Old Coach road there is something{supernatural.}It is said that there is a{ghost.}The story is that every Saturday night the ghost of a horseman rides furiously up and down the lane because his girlfriend died in a{stagecoach}long ago. The horseman was riding after the stagecoach to stop it, when it turned over and everyone inside was killed. The Redcoats saw what had happened and shot the horseman dead in the middle of the lane. The lane is long and winding, dusty and bumpy, and very spookey.The house where I live is very old and it is also supposed to be{ {haunted.}
